item.title: The Sibling who became the Sun and the Moon
item.description: Hey, K-VIBE fam! Have you ever looked up at the sun and the moon and wondered about the incredible stories they might hold? In Korea, we certainly do! Many cultures have myths about these celestial bodies, but there’s one particular Korean tale that has not only shaped our understanding of the cosmos but also deeply woven itself into our everyday language and cultural consciousness. Get ready, because today we’re diving into the enchanting world of **The Sibling who became the Sun and the Moon (해와 달이 된 오누이)**!
